thread.title: Trump says to make immigration deal only if good for U.S. - White House

title: Trump says to make immigration deal only if good for U.S. - White House
text:
Trump says to make immigration deal only if good for U.S. - White House 4:54am IST - 00:47 
President Donald Trump said on Monday that he would make a deal on immigration only if he sees it as beneficial for the country. Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
President Donald Trump said on Monday that he would make a deal on immigration only if he sees it as beneficial for the country. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).
